node.title: Police name man found dead at rural property south of Nelson
node.description: Police have named a 56-year-old man found dead at a rural property in Hope on Wednesday.
node.content:
["Police have named the 56-year-old man found dead at a rural property in Hope, near Nelson, on Wednesday as Simon Allan Bevers.", "", "
File image. Photo: RNZ / Patrice Allen
", "His family have been advised.", "A forensic examination at the Edens Road property, involving police investigators, ESR and other specialists, is ongoing and expected to be completed during the weekend.", "Police announced yesterday that a homicide investigation into Bevers' death had been launched."]
